DataListSpec.Name: Child Project Departed Children Data List
DataListSpec.Description: Data list to show a list of departed children on the child project page.
DataListSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

SPDataList.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_CHILDPROJECT_CHILDRENLIST_DEPARTED( @CONTEXTID uniqueidentifier, @CHILDLOOKUPID nvarchar(100) = null, @CHILDNAME nvarchar(200) = null ) as declare @eligibilityCodeIneligible tinyint = 2 begin try declare @numberSponsorshipReasons tinyint -- The number of sponsorship reasons (waiting list and batch commit) that should be checked to include children with that sponsorship reason in the returned set of children set @numberSponsorshipReasons = 5
declare @sponsorhipReasonsToInclude table ( sponsorshipReasonID uniqueidentifier )
-- Departure / Completion reaons insert @sponsorhipReasonsToInclude select ID from SPONSORSHIPREASON where lower (REASON) = 'departure'
insert @sponsorhipReasonsToInclude select ID from SPONSORSHIPREASON where lower (REASON) = 'departure - admin'
insert @sponsorhipReasonsToInclude select ID from SPONSORSHIPREASON where lower (REASON) = 'departure - other'
insert @sponsorhipReasonsToInclude select ID from SPONSORSHIPREASON where lower (REASON) = 'program completion'
insert @sponsorhipReasonsToInclude select ID from SPONSORSHIPREASON where lower (REASON) = 'death of child'
-- Get the number of reasons inserted declare @reasonCount tinyint select @reasonCount = count(*) from @sponsorhipReasonsToInclude
if @reasonCount <> @numberSponsorshipReasons RAISERROR 1000000 'Could not find all of the departure reason ids' end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
set nocount on;
select FIELDOFFICEID, so.ID SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID, so.LOOKUPID CHILDLOOKUPID, so_child.NAME, ch_ext.DATEADDED, so_child.AGE, so_child.GENDER, dbo.UFN_DATE_FROMFUZZYDATE (so_child.BIRTHDATE) BIRTHDATE, sreason.REASON as DEPARTUREREASON
from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD so_child on so.ID = so_child.ID inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPREASON sreason on so.SPONSORSHIPREASONID = sreason.id left join dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION ch_ext on so.ID = ch_ext.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID left join dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATION slocation ON slocation.ID = so.SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONID
where FIELDOFFICEID = @CONTEXTID and exists (select sponsorshipReasonID from @sponsorhipReasonsToInclude reasonstoinclude where reasonstoinclude.sponsorshipReasonID = so.SPONSORSHIPREASONID) and so.ELIGIBILITYCODE = @eligibilityCodeIneligible and (@CHILDLOOKUPID is null or so.LOOKUPID like '%' + @CHILDLOOKUPID + '%') and (@CHILDNAME is null or so_child.NAME like '%' + @CHILDNAME + '%')
